DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of AGG-523 administration on biomarkers related to osteoarthritis. Safety and tolerability of AGG-523 will also be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating AGG-523 in Subjects With Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Mild to moderate Osteoarthritis of the target knee. Subjects must be generally healthy but enrolled with stable chronic illness if well controlled.
